last_episode_to_air.name: Brain Freeze
last_episode_to_air.overview: After losing their memories from a wicked brain freeze, Fanboy and Chum Chum must retrace their steps to locate their missing underwear.

name: Fanboy and Chum Chum
overview:
Fanboy & Chum Chum is an American CGI animated television series created by Eric Robles for Nickelodeon. It is based on Fanboy, an animated short created by Robles for Nickelodeon and Frederator Studios, which was broadcast August 14, 2008 on Random! Cartoons.

The series premiere drew 5.8 million viewers. The second episode was watched by 5.4 million viewers.

The theme song was written by Brad Joseph Breeck and performed by experimental punk band The Mae Shi.

No third season was announced at Nickelodeon's upfront for the 2013-2014 season.

episodes.name: Wizboy
episodes.overview: The boys think Kyle (the new kid) is a pretend wizard. But, the boys soon learn that their new friend is an actual wizard expelled from a wizard school called Milkweed Academy.

episodes.name: Pick a Nose
episodes.overview: The boys switch noses for class picture day, but rivaly is just around the corner.

episodes.name: The Janitor Strikes Back
episodes.overview: Yum Yum (Fanboy and Chum Chum's gum friend) comes to school, but the new janitor is on the case.

episodes.name: Dollar Day
episodes.overview: The boys go to the Frosty Mart to by Frosty Freezy Freezes, but Chum Chum spends their only dollar on Boog's Chimp Chomp game.

episodes.name: Trading Day
episodes.overview: Fanboy trades Chum Chum for Yo's Mecha-Tech robot.

episodes.name: Digital Pet Cemetery
episodes.overview: After they accidentally "power down" Yo's digital pet cat Scampers, Fanboy and Chum Chum bury it at the graveyard only to make it come back as a zombie.

episodes.name: I, Fanbot
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum have a test coming up and if the entire class passes, they win a bouncy house. Fanboy decides to install his brain into Oz's robot to get smarter, but worse results come to follow.

episodes.name: Berry Sick
episodes.overview: When a heatwave hits Galaxy Hills, the boys see the Frosty Freezy Freeze machine is on the fritz. They try to nurse Berry, the ice monster who runs the machine back to health but wind up getting "Frosty Freezy Freeze Fever" the moment they lick him.

episodes.name: Chimp Chomp Chumps
episodes.overview: Boog will do anything for the boys if he wants to get one of their 3 tickets to see a Chimp Chomp movie.

episodes.name: Precious Pig
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum take home and care for the class pet pig, Precious. But Mr. Mufflin catches Fanboy teaching him kung fu and thinks he's hurting him, so he takes Precious back and Fanboy can no longer care for him.

episodes.name: Monster in the Mist
episodes.overview: Boog believes he saw a monster in the Frosty Mart, and Fanboy and Chum Chum help him catch it.

episodes.name: Fangboy
episodes.overview: Fanboy suspects he's bitten by a vampire, and the boys go see a neck specialist who IS a vampire.

episodes.name: Brain Drain
episodes.overview: Fanboy gets amnesia, causing Chum Chum to become an open target for Yo.

episodes.name: Chicken Pox
episodes.overview: Kyle transforms into a chicken after getting the chicken pox, so the boys try to get him to turn back to normal by laying an egg.

episodes.name: Norse-ing Around
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum meet a Viking named Thorvald, and try to get him back home to Valhala.

episodes.name: The Janitor's Apprentice
episodes.overview: When Fanboy and Chum Chum are punished for making a mess in the cafeteria, they have to help Janitor Poopatine clean up the school.

episodes.name: Excuse Me
episodes.overview: Fanboy, Chum Chum and Kyle get Kyle's Scrivener Elf to write fake excuse notes to get out of various classes.

episodes.name: Night Morning
episodes.overview: Chum Chum shows Fanboy a time of day called Night-Morning (midnight). Fanboy invites the whole class over to party, but it doesn't seem as fun to them as Fanboy and Chum Chum do.

episodes.name: Marsha, Marsha, Marsha
episodes.overview: The boys wind up in the wrong playground and are mistaken for preschoolers. While there, they encounter Marsha, Fanboy's archenemy.

episodes.name: Secret Shopper
episodes.overview: The boys learn to take care of business when a Secret Shopper comes to the Frosty Mart.

episodes.name: The Frosty Bus
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum have a burping contest. When it's Fanboy's turn a song comes out, but it turned out to be The Frosty Bus. Everyone except for the boys ran up to it. Fanboy told Chum Chum to work up a thirst. So the ran around on the play ground as fast as they could and licked a fire hydrent. Then they couldn't decided what to get and then Lenny's shift was over so he went crazy saying "PINK, BLUE, PINK, BLUE, PINK, BLUE MAKE UP YOUR MIND!!!" (since Fanboy kept saying pink, blue, pink, blue.) So Boog came and missed their cups on purpose and tied the boys into a pretzel. Next Boog goes to play Chimp Chomp. the boys put their mouths to the pipes but Boog put helium in them. Then Fanboy dresses as a cop. Chum Chum had a siren that let him sound like anything. They tricked Boog but there was a call about a seagull stealing snacks. Then they brake Chimp Chomp on purpose. They told Boog to meet them behind to Frosty Bus in a hour. When he did they tricked him with a fake Chimp Chomp. Then they crash the Frosty Bus. And the sign crushes Boog.

episodes.name: Cold War
episodes.overview: The boys are under the weather, and when they wind up fighting each other, they also fight over Kyle's attention when he comes to visit them.

episodes.name: Fanboy in the Plastic Bubble
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum buy Boog's plastic bubble from a yard sale, but Boog gets outraged when he descovers it makes the riders bop-proof.

episodes.name: Fan vs. Wild
episodes.overview: Fanboy, Chum Chum and Kyle go camping on the Frosty Mart roof, but Kyle accidentally drops the rope to get down, forcing the boys to try and survive in the roof's bitter, cold, frosty weather!

episodes.name: The Incredible Shrinking Fanboy
episodes.overview: Fanboy worries that he's shrinking, and moves into Yo's dollhouse.

episodes.name: Separation Anxiety
episodes.overview: The boys' desks are separated for singing out loud during "Quiet Time", so they try to get reunited.

episodes.name: Strings Attached
episodes.overview: Fanboy is turned into a puppet and tries to prove himself worthy by doing a good deed, but it doesn't go well.

episodes.name: The Book Report of the Dead
episodes.overview: Fanboy swipes Kyle's spellbook to finish his book report, but ends up turning Mr. Mufflin into a zombie.

episodes.name: Stan Arctica
episodes.overview: Man-Arctica poses as a storeworker named Stan at Oz's when Fanboy and Chum Chum believe that he disappeared forever.

episodes.name: Man-Arctica the Ride
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum are eager to ride a new roller coaster, but Fanboy's excitement later turns into fear.

episodes.name: Fan-bidextrous
episodes.overview: Fanboy trains himself to be ambidextrous in order to be a better class clown.

episodes.name: Saving Private Chum Chum
episodes.overview: After Hank takes away everyone's toys due to no toys allowed in class, he mistakes Chum Chum for one and takes him as well.

episodes.name: Jingle Fever
episodes.overview: Lenny tries to ruin Fanboy and Chum Chum's chances of winning a million Frosty Bucks by stopping them from writing a jingle.

episodes.name: Eyes on the Prize
episodes.overview: The boys have no luck while searching for a cereal box toy that's in limited condition, so they seek help from Oz.

episodes.name: Battle of the Stands
episodes.overview: The boys start a lemonade stand, but Lupe and Yo start a competing one across the street.

episodes.name: Lord of the Rings
episodes.overview: Kyle tries to find out how Fanboy can connect two rings together.

episodes.name: The Incredible Chulk
episodes.overview: Chum Chum grows into a Chulk, and Fanboy has fun. But when Chum Chum shrinks to normal size due to Boog scaring him, Fanboy tries to make him grow again.

episodes.name: The Great Bicycle Mystery
episodes.overview: When Lenny's bike gets destroyed outside the Frosty Mart, Fanboy and Chum Chum try to determine who did it.

episodes.name: A Bopwork Orange
episodes.overview: The boys teach Boog how to stop bopping so he can stay at the Frosty Mart.

episodes.name: Freeze Tag
episodes.overview: Man-Arctica takes a game of freeze tag up to a new level by freezing everybody! Fanboy and Chum Chum do their best not to get frozen.

episodes.name: I'm Man-Arctica!
episodes.overview: Man-Arctica tries to prove who he is when Fanboy and Chum Chum refuse to believe him.

episodes.name: No Toy Story
episodes.overview: The boys throw out everything they believe to be baby toys, leaving them with an empty Fanlair.

episodes.name: GameBoy
episodes.overview: After the boys accidentally release the monkey from Boog's favorite video game, Chum Chum sneaks into the machine and pretends to be Chimp Chomp so that Boog doesn't find out.

episodes.name: Crib Notes
episodes.overview: Kyle's scheme to cheat his way back into Milkweed backfires when his spell for crib notes turns him into a baby.

episodes.name: Schoolhouse Lock
episodes.overview: The boys get locked in the school right before summer vacation.

episodes.name: Back From The Future
episodes.overview: Lenny goes back in time to stop the boys from having their first Frosty Freezy Freeze.

episodes.name: Tooth or Scare
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum accidentally cause Kyle to lose a tooth, which means the Wizard Tooth Fairy is coming. But unlike the normal Tooth Fairy, when the Wizard Tooth Fairy comes, he takes all your teeth.

episodes.name: The Big Bopper
episodes.overview: Boog meets a bully much bigger and more aggressive than him.

episodes.name: Present Not Accounted For
episodes.overview: Fanboy forgets Chum Chum's birthday, and desperately scrambles to find a gift for him.

episodes.name: The Sword in the Throne
episodes.overview: When Fanboy learns that he is the king of the janitors, Janitor Poopatine is forced to tutor him by the Custodial Council.

episodes.name: Brain Freeze
episodes.overview: After losing their memories from a wicked brain freeze, Fanboy and Chum Chum must retrace their steps to locate their missing underwear.

episodes.name: Slime Day
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum can't figure out how to get slimed on Slime Day, because they don't know the secret phrase. So they travel to the Nickelodeon studio to get the secret phrase from the president of the company.

episodes.name: Boog Zapper
episodes.overview: Fed up with Boog's bullying, Fanboy builds up an electric charge so he can shock Boog.

episodes.name: Risky Brizness
episodes.overview: When Oz's cousin, Brizwald, comes to town, Oz is certain he is after his most valuable Man-Arctica comic book.

episodes.name: Kids In The Hall
episodes.overview: Hall monitors Fanboy and Chum Chum complicate Kyle's attempt to get back into Milkweed Academy.

episodes.name: Frosty Mart Dream Vacation
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum win a dream vacation and believe that means they can take it at the Frosty Mart.

episodes.name: Field Trip of Horrors
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum try to derail a field trip to the horrible Glop Mines, where they've heard that a kid-eating glop monster lives.

episodes.name: There Will Be Shrieks
episodes.overview: When Fanboy and Chum Chum lose their taste sense to a Halloween spirit, Mr. Trick, they try to bring him 1,000 screams in order to get it back.

episodes.name: Igloo of Irritation
episodes.overview: When the boys crash land on Planet Hasselhoth, their friendly visit with Man-Arctica results in the trio's capture by Man-Arctica's nemesis, Global Warmer.

episodes.name: HypnotOZed
episodes.overview: When Oz's new, vintage Boom Bot toy hypnotizes him into selling items whenever the doorbell to his shop rings, he ends up selling all of his collectors' items.

episodes.name: Robo-mance
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum play cupids when Dollar-nator falls in love with Oz's new robot librarian, Julie Android.

episodes.name: Rattleskunkupine!
episodes.overview: The boys find a new pet that's a cross between a rattlesnake, a skunk, and a porcupine. This animal is called the rattleskunkupine, but Fanboy and Chum Chum name it Scooter. They have to hide it from Oz when they learn that it's terrorizing the city.

episodes.name: Bubble Trouble
episodes.overview: Boog is ecstatic to meet the Chimp Chomp champion. However, the boys have to get Boog across the street when he has an allergy to their Man-Arctic Seal uniforms and is stuck in his childhood bubble.

episodes.name: Lucky Chums
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum find a Leprechaun in a box of cereal, but he refuses to give them the mystery cereal shape the cereal box promised.

episodes.name: The Last Strawberry Fun Finger
episodes.overview: The boys find a third Strawberry Fun Finger in their usual two-pack and desperately try to decide who gets to eat it.

episodes.name: Power Out
episodes.overview: The boys cause a town-wide blackout when they settle in to watch a movie called Robot Pirate Ninja President from the future.

episodes.name: Dental Illness
episodes.overview: When Fanboy gets a toothache, he must overcome his fear of the dentist to seek treatment. Worst of all, the dentist is a vampire with a scary-sounding machine called the Extractor in his office.

episodes.name: Champ of Chomp
episodes.overview: The boys endeavor to help Boog beat the all-time record in Chimp Chomp. However they accidentally unplug the machine and delete Boog's score when he finally beats the record.

episodes.name: Lice Lice Baby
episodes.overview: The boys develop a crush on Nurse Lady Pam on Lice Inspection Day, and soon both fight over her affection.

episodes.name: Get You Next Time
episodes.overview: After Retchy Lintpockets spots Fanboy a piece of taffy on credit, Fanboy promises to get him next time. But instead, Retchy promises to get Fanboy next time, in this Raimi-esque tale of suspense!

episodes.name: A Very Brrr-y Icemas
episodes.overview: After Fanboy winds up on Man-Arctica's Naughty List, the boys infiltrate the Igloo of Isolation to try to get him back onto the Good List in time for Icemas.

episodes.name: Funny Face
episodes.overview: After Fanboy creates the perfect goofy face, he is determined to use it to make the class photo hilarious.

episodes.name: Put That Cookie Down!
episodes.overview: Lenny bakes Chocolatonium chip cookies for Agent Johnson's birthday and orders Dollar-nator to keep them away from Fanboy and Chum Chum at all costs.

episodes.name: Two Tickets to Paladise
episodes.overview: When best pals Fanboy and Chum Chum notice a frightening rift in their friendship, Oz teaches them how to return to paladise.

episodes.name: The Winners
episodes.overview: After Fanboy and Chum Chum discover they have the Frosty Freezy Freeze Sweepstakes winning cup, everyone in Galaxy Hills conspires to take it from them.

episodes.name: Hex Games
episodes.overview: Kyle is angered when Sigmund releases a new video game, but when he learns the winner gets to go to Milkweed, Fanboy and Chum Chum help him win it.

episodes.name: Speed Eraser
episodes.overview: When Kyle loses his job as Official Chalkboard Eraser to Fanboy, Kyle gives him a magical eraser that can erase whole objects, hoping it will get Fanboy in trouble.

episodes.name: Heroes vs. Villains
episodes.overview: After reading a captivating comic book, the boys don't agree on whether heroes are better than villains, or if villains are better than heroes. They continue their debate as Super Chum and Fannihilator.

episodes.name: Face-Eating Aliens From Planet X
episodes.overview: The boys dress up like girls to infiltrate Yo's slumber party to prove that girls are face-eating aliens from Planet X.

episodes.name: The Cold Rush
episodes.overview: Faniel and Chumtholemew are two 1800s wild west prospectors on the hunt for the fabled Frosty Freezy Freeze.

episodes.name: Camp-Arctica
episodes.overview: The boys win an opportunity to hang out with Man-Arctica at his insufferably cold summer camp, only to discover an easy escape at Global Warmer's summer camp.

episodes.name: Buddy Up
episodes.overview: Fanboy, Chum Chum and Kyle get lost in the desert after partnering up for a field trip to the Dinosaur Museum, and later encounter a dinosaur in real life.

episodes.name: Normal Day
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum's plans to have a totally normal day are ruined when all the weird things and characters they've been faced with on their many adventures return to town, including Thorvald.

episodes.name: Microphonies
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum's new Ultra Deluxe Mega Mic toy allows them to make their own crazy sound effects in addition to auto-tuning their voices. Problems arise when Fanboy and Chum Chum abuse the Mega Mic and make Mr. Mufflin think that school's out. Things get even worse when it starts to make sounds on its own.

episodes.name: Freezy Freaks
episodes.overview: When Boog is forced to wear the costume of the Frosty Mart mascot Freezy, the boys are convinced he is the real Freezy.

episodes.name: Super Chums
episodes.overview: In this superhero cartoon parody, Super Chum works with Fannihilator to stop Copy Kitten from taking Fannihilator's place as Super Chum's best nemesis.

episodes.name: Attack of the Clones
episodes.overview: The boys create clones of themselves so they can go on a field trip to the thermometer factory. But the inattentive clones create more clones, and the town is quickly overrun by highly unstable, zombie-like Cloneboys and Chum Clones.

episodes.name: Secret Club
episodes.overview: Fanboy and Chum Chum learn about a secret club in Galaxy Hills and do whatever they can to locate it.
